Description: At first: Please make sure that you have generated Lform for the given View and Lform for all detail Views (in terms of master-detail relation)
At second: Please make sure that you selected the folder of Prism ModelO2mformModule-project for the given View
i.e. right-click View folder of the Prism ModelO2mformModule-project
You start with LitGenre  DataBase Entity and generate the pair: LitGenreView and LitGenreViewPage under the group of Web Projects
Under the group of WPF Projects in the Prism ModelO2mformModule-project create the folder with a name: LitGenre
To run current batch right-click  LitGenre-forlder of the step (2)
Project Type of ModelServicesModule for the given View: .Net(.Net Core) Prism-Module
As a rule, a separate ModelO2mformModule-project must be created for each view.
Open the files in the sub-folder
and follow the instruction at the beginning of the files
